text.jpText:
グランドライブは大いに盛り上がった！
ウマ娘とファンは想いをぶつけ合い、
かけがえのないひと時を共に過ごす。
text.enText:
The grand live was a lot of fun! horsegirl 
and fans shared their feelings and fans share 
an irreplaceable moment together.

text.jpText:
念願のグランドライブ復活を遂げた
ライトハローも舞台袖から共に楽しみ、
ステージのウマ娘たちを優しく見守る。
text.enText:
Light Hello, who had long hoped for the 
revival of the Grand Live, also enjoyed the 
show from offstage, gently watching over the 
horsegirls on stage. Light Hello also enjoyed 
the show from offstage, and gently watched 
over the horsegirl on stage.

text.jpText:
舞台裏では成功を喜ぶ少女たちの
ハイタッチが響く。彼女たちは駆けていく。
自分を待つ、ファンのもとへと――
text.enText:
High-fives echoed backstage as the girls 
rejoiced in their success. The girls run to 
their fans, who are waiting for them. To 
their fans, who are waiting for them…
